MGEReal is extended real number, i.e., it includes minus infinite and plus infinite except ordinary real number. More...

Detailed Description

MGEReal is extended real number, i.e., it includes minus infinite and plus infinite except ordinary real number.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

infinite=-1 means minus_infinite, +1 means plus_infinite.
